name: The (K)night detective
description:
Gameplay

The (K)night detective
In (K)night detective you find yourself in a strange noir city where the streets are walked by all shorts of fantasy creatures. This very city is curenly terrorized by a robot knight and his shadow army. You control a mysterious elf detective who is the only one to save it from doom.

Move your character from left, to right, up or down. Dodge attacks and slay the monsters coming your way. Move on to the final level where you defeat the boss to win the game.

Controls

MoveW A S D / Arrow keys
JumpSpaceAttackLeft mouse button / Left control
